products.name: Ultra HD 4K Television
products.description: A 55-inch Ultra HD 4K television with HDR and smart capabilities. Enjoy crisp and vibrant visuals with advanced color accuracy.

products.name: Wireless Noise-Cancelling Headphones
products.description: High-quality wireless headphones with active noise cancellation and Bluetooth connectivity. Perfect for immersive listening experiences.

products.name: Smart Home Security Camera
products.description: A compact, high-definition security camera with motion detection and cloud storage. Keep an eye on your home from anywhere.

products.name: Portable Power Bank
products.description: A 10,000mAh portable power bank with fast-charging capabilities. Keep your devices powered on the go.

products.name: High-Speed Blender
products.description: A high-speed blender with multiple blending modes and a powerful motor. Ideal for making smoothies, soups, and sauces.

products.name: Ergonomic Office Chair
products.description: An ergonomic office chair with adjustable lumbar support and a reclining feature. Designed for comfort during long work hours.

products.name: Smartwatch with Fitness Tracking
products.description: A smartwatch with fitness tracking features, including heart rate monitoring, GPS, and sleep tracking. Stay on top of your health goals.

products.name: Compact Digital Camera
products.description: A compact digital camera with a 20MP sensor and built-in Wi-Fi. Capture high-quality photos and share them instantly.

products.name: Stylish Laptop Backpack
products.description: A sleek laptop backpack with padded compartments for your devices and ample space for other essentials. Perfect for professionals on the move.

products.name: Home Espresso Machine
products.description: An advanced home espresso machine with a built-in grinder and milk frother. Brew barista-quality coffee at home.

products.name: Bluetooth Portable Speaker
products.description: A waterproof Bluetooth speaker with deep bass and up to 12 hours of playtime. Enjoy music wherever you are.

products.name: Electric Toothbrush
products.description: An electric toothbrush with multiple brushing modes and a built-in timer. Enhance your oral hygiene with advanced cleaning technology.

products.name: Gourmet Knife Set
products.description: A high-quality gourmet knife set with precision blades and ergonomic handles. Ideal for culinary enthusiasts and professional chefs.

products.name: Air Purifier with HEPA Filter
products.description: An air purifier featuring a HEPA filter and multiple purification modes. Improve indoor air quality and reduce allergens.

products.name: Digital Drawing Tablet
products.description: A digital drawing tablet with pressure sensitivity and customizable buttons. Perfect for artists and graphic designers.
